TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SessionAttribute extends System.Web.ModelBinding.ValueProviderSourceAttribute

Docs.summary: Represents an attribute that specifies that values for model binding are provided by session state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
